text: Marion is a city in and the county seat of Marion County, Ohio, United States. The city is located in north-central Ohio, about north of Columbus. The population was 35,999 at the 2020 census. President Warren G. Harding was a resident of Marion for much of his adult life.Hall, Sherry Smart. Warren G. Harding and the Marion Daily Star: How Newspapering Shaped a President. Charlotte, NC: The History Press. 2014. ==References== Category:Cities in Ohio Category:County seats in Ohio
title: Marion, Ohio
